title: When we don't need "alt+enter" to play a game?
body:
This happened since Wednesday, but I didn't see any action Riot trying to fix this problem? Pls pls fix this bug. I can't stand playing in a small screen anymore.

Pls pls do something. Thx{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}}

replies.body:
We're looking into a solution for this issue, but I'm afraid I'm unable to provide you with an ETA on when that fix will go out.

As *LeRevolverBlanc* mentioned, you can hop into your in-game settings and switch to a **Borderless* window mode, just stay away from *Fullscreen* until we've resolved the issue. Let me know if you have any questions.
Once in windowed mode if you go to video settings and change to borderless u can play like its fullscreen just when u tab out it wont minimize.
